title: New: Henry Green – Shift
body:
Another slice of slick electronic-pop taken from his forthcoming debut album of the same name.

_Shift_ again puts **Henry Green** up alongside the finest in his field right now; intricate, emotional compositions that feel simultaneously effortless and deeply considered. Shift is released 30 March, and is followed by a full [EU tour](https://henrygreenmusic.com/#tour). Check it out below.
